title: Is not buying a sightstone as a support reportable?
body: I always report my stupid supports who think they can just keep their warding trinket all game and build random items because its basically asking to lose the game. Invariably it always leads to the enemy team getting a baron with no vision on them, and multiple dragons. The question is, will there actually be any punishment for these players who are ruining games? If they always queue for support and refuse to buy the KEY item for their role...they are ruining so many games every day.

replies.body: it is not reportable, it is stupid not to buy them but it is not reportable
its literally not doing your best to win the game :l
not really if they manage to do well without vision and arent running down mid then they are fine

But Rito has stated over adn over and over and over that they will NOT punish people for going "off meta".   While very stupid of supports not to do this, getting items besides sightstone is technically going off meta.
Anyone can buy a Sightstone. It is usually most efficient on supports but is not restricted to them. Not like the health won't help anyone else

We should also report any jungler who doesn't buy Tracker's Knife too!

/s

And the ADC who doesn't build last whisper

And the mage who doesn't build void staff

And the ad champion who doesn't build executioner's calling against healing enemies

And the tank who doesn't build thornmail against healing enemies

And anyone who doesn't have a control ward down 100% of the game until full build
I was poking fun at the OP, as he's often a jg who doesn't build a tracker's knife and complains about vision.
Why would it be reportable?  You can't get punished for buying or not buying a certain item.  Did YOU buy any pink to drop in baron???

No. It's not reportable.

_If_ it's a ranked game, I can understand you getting upset. But, it's not a reportable offense.

I mean, supports don't report you, when you tell them which champion or summoner spells to take. Highly offensive. Not reportable.

and, you know, YOU could lay a few wards.
Reportable no, but very annoying i must say

I can understand that people think its not reportable, and even if it doesnt do anything, i report anyone who dares to not buy a Sightstone as a Support.

Sightstone is efficient on Supports.

They are the ones that have the biggest impact on vision because of that.

Their Job is to ward and clear wards, like everyone else, but they are the primary ones, even Riot thinks so, why else would they combine Sightstone with the 
Support Items? If other lanes should buy Sightstone, there surely would be a Rabadons with a Sightstone attached to it, no?

Everyone who doesnt buy a Sightstone as a Support, isnt a Support. He isnt playing his role, which is reportable, so im going to report him.
Since they've done nothing reportable, all it will end up doing is lowering your report value.
Not playing your supposed role is reportable tho.

Not buying one item isn't 'not playing your supposed role'.
If they did what the singed guy was doing (Counterjungling the whole game) then that's not playing your role. But choosing to do something abnormal isn't playing your supposed role.

You arent a Support if youre not building Sightstone.

Youre not a damage carry if you dont build Damage Items.

If youre not going Crit as a Jinx, youre crippling yourself aswell.

"Report weight" doesn't exist anymore with the birth of the IFS.  I can report everyone every single game I play whether valid or not and my "report value" would be exactly the same (might not make Tantrum happy if he looks into my account though.... ;^) ).
Ah, wasn't aware of that, thanks.

That's your right to do.  You can report anyone for whatever reason you want.

I would be careful about "voicing" this opinion in chat though because you might get counter-reported and end up creating a thread of your own on this board...
That fucking name

As a support, you should ward cause it's like their job but you don't always have to buy Sightstone or ward in general, it's up to the player. Now if people do ward = more vision = win.

I would not say this is reportable.
No, but I wish it was.

As someone who mainly plays the Support role, while i think its right not for it to be a reportable offense, i think we can all agree its pretty dumb move. Vision works well in this game and it helps win games. But if the team isnt utilizing it, or using it to their advantage then what is the point? Heck the seer fact there are some people who play this game that still believe Supports should be the only ones Warding despite Riot not only giving everyone a free ward, but also placing a limit on placing ward shows that the community as a whole hasnt learn. 

What im trying to say is that unless you believe you dont need it, always get a SightStone. Everyone should be warding period!
Lately, the trend seems to be rush censer, then build sightstone. It's an effective strategy. Reporting people for using strategies that are different from the norm isn't going to do anything.

No, calling people stupid is rude, just because your support didn't build sight stone doesn't mean your able to get them punished, even if they defend about it, as long as they don't say racial slurs,be toxic.flame or int, you can't report them, you might get banned for abusing the report system.
No but not building ancient coin should be
